title: Welcome Visitors
synopsis: Welcome to this [[Federated Wiki]] site. From this page you can find who we are and what we do. New sites provide this information and then claim the site as their own. You will need your own site to participate.

title: Airbnb Rejections
synopsis: The founder of Airbnb, a startup valued at $25 billion dollars, shares some of his rejection letters for early funding. [http://qz.com/452185/the-rejection-letters-of-early-round-investors-who-passed-on-airbnb/ post]
